name: Igor Gilitschenski
content: Igor Gilitschenski Igor Gilitschenski I am an Assistant Professor in Computer Science at the University of Toronto where I lead the Toronto Intelligent Systems Lab. My work focuses on developing novel probabilistic and learning-based techniques for robotic perception and decision-making with the ultimate goal of enabling robust interactive autonomy.
